name: On Thin Ice
description: A high-risk, high-reward script where dangerous characters and risky abilities can lead to quick victories or devastating defeats.
author: Community Created
specialRules: Multiple characters can die from their own abilities
Game can end suddenly or extend dramatically
setupNotes: Bad Moon Rising characters emphasizing risk/reward mechanics and multiple death possibilities.
howToRun: Risky plays and fragile states. Announce when conditions worsen or improve. Be consistent with break-once rules.

firstNight.description: Wake all Minions together. Show them who the other Minions are and who the Demon is
Wake the Demon. Show them who their Minions are. Give them 3 character tokens as bluffs

tipsAndTricks: Good: Take calculated risks early; cash out before endgame. Evil: Lure good into overcommitting or into lethal trades.
bluffing: Claim you’re saving a clutch once-per-game—until you “must” use it.
